channel.title: Problem
channel.description:
When I edit certain parts of my source for example I changed some prices for some items and then when I compile it says finished yet nothing happens... It also does this with monster drops and deleting items from the shop...
Can someone help me please...

item.title: Problem
item.dc:creator: @TomWoolner TomWoolner
item.description:
@TomWoolner wrote:

mate this is what im trying to say… it doesnt work :mad:

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Dude what you are changing is a .cfg file!
soo you dont need to compile this is what to do:
Open the cfg file edit it save it Restart server then watch it…

item.title: Problem
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

make them all the same.
see if that works. then change them one by one by process of elimination. until you get it the way you want.

the first three numbers are;
high alch
low alch
and store price.

normally, but im unsure of the order in which they are in the code.
but yeah.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

there is a clear difference between the two,

the compiler in a 508 is called build.exe.
if it’s called compile.exe or compiler.exe , it’s most likely a 317

Read full topic
